function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of larger and more livable living spaces facing green areas","Impact":"Increased risk of mental health issues such as depression and psychological distress","Mitigation":"Implementing housing design strategies focused on larger and more livable living spaces facing green areas","Technologies":"Urban planning and green space design","People":"Residents of buildings with inadequate living spaces and green areas","Owner":"Urban planners and housing policy makers"},{"Description":"Interdisciplinary approach and investigation needed","Impact":"Lack of understanding of the effects of the built environment on mental health outcomes","Mitigation":"Implementing an interdisciplinary approach involving various fields such as urban planning, public mental health, environmental health, epidemiology, and sociology","Technologies":"Collaborative research and data analysis tools","People":"Researchers and policymakers investigating the effects of the built environment on mental health outcomes","Owner":"Research institutions and government agencies"},{"Description":"Centrality of welfare and housing policies in population well-being","Impact":"Inadequate welfare and housing policies may lead to negative mental health outcomes in the population","Mitigation":"Development of welfare and housing policies centered on population well-being, especially in COVID-19 times","Technologies":"Policy analysis and data-driven decision making tools","People":"General population, especially in times of COVID-19","Owner":"Government agencies and policy makers"}]}
